name: Boom The Bushes
description:
A simple endless game I made this week, try to avoid enemies and not blow yourself up.

Controls:
* Arrow Keys: Move
* Z: Drops a bomb
* X: Uses your powerup

Powerups:
* Blue: Kills all enemies
* Coin: Score+10
* Orange: Invincibility for 10 seconds

Have fun and don't die ;)
